title.jp: Sae, The Magic Club and the Cherry Blossom Tree

synopsis: The Magic User’s Club defeated a giant ship from outer space! But their close encounter left a huge cherry blossom tree in the middle of the city. Takeo calls a club meeting to deal with the tree, but their magic backfires…

title.jp: Nanaka, a Cake and the Dangerous Evening

synopsis: Nanaka has had enough of her rude, careless family! She’s running away to live with Sae (again). When Akane drops by, the three girls set up a slumber party full of fun, laughter, and out-of-control magic.

title.jp: Aburatsubo, Morning Face and the Parent Teacher Meetings

synopsis: It’s time for Parent-Teacher Meetings, and no one is dreading it more than Aburatsubo. He’s normally cool, calm and composed, but the mere mention of his mother sends him into a panic - and she’ll be arriving any minute now!

title.jp: Sae, the Bathroom and the Door

synopsis: Today’s lesson for the Magic User’s Club is a spell that will let them teleport anywhere they want. But it doesn’t really work… or does it? Now, whenever they walk through a door, they have no idea what will be on the other side!

title.jp: Akane, the Hiccups and a Strange Relationship

synopsis: Something’s wrong with Akane. Her magic is out of control, she’s constantly blushing, and… did she just ask Takeo to go out with her?! Time for the rest of the club (and Mizuha Miyama) to snoop around and get to the bottom of this!

title.jp: Takakura, Origami and the Secret Date

synopsis: The club made origami using magic, and Sae did really well! But ever since then, something has been a bit off. Time keeps flashing around Sae, as her dreams and reality start mixing together. There’s only one person who can help…

title.jp: Sae, a Tomato and the Dance of the Paint Brush

synopsis: The Culture Festival is coming, and Sae wants to make it something special! But the rest of the club isn’t quite so enthusiastic. What’s more, if they want the space to hold their own event, they’ll have to fight Miyama to get it!

title.jp: Alice, Railroad Tracks and the Cracker

synopsis: Sae’s plans for the Culture Festival are quickly falling apart. Takeo is fighting with Miyama, everyone else is overbooked, and now a strange new person has appeared. Is this mysterious “Alice in Wonderland” a friend or a foe?

title.jp: Kimonos, Short Shorts and the Age of Joy

synopsis: Sae wants to find the mysterious person she keeps seeing – and Akane knows just where to look. She leads Sae and Nanaka to a place where the two are quickly dressed in kimonos, handed scripts, and told to get ready for an audition!

title.jp: Snow, the Colt and a First Kiss

synopsis: Sae is off to the Hokkaido countryside to visit the family farm! It’s fun to see her parents again, and to take care of the horses that she loves. But suddenly, Jurika appears. How did he get there, and what could he possibly want?

title.jp: Akane, the Mirror and the End of Year Sale

synopsis: Jurika has many powers, but the strangest one of all is that he seems to know everyone’s heart. He knows what each member of the club is thinking, and he’s about to bring those thoughts into the open, whether they want him to or not.

title.jp: The Kite, the Whirlwind and Micky

synopsis: Akane is on a rampage! Or at least, she would be, if it wasn’t for all that ennui. But one way or another, she needs to be stopped before she hurts someone. It’s up to Sae and Nanaka, but they aren’t alone – Micky appears to help!

The truth about Jurika has been revealed, and Sae has vowed to never use magic again. But Jurika won’t let her go – he’s locked her away in a place no one can reach. Takeo and the others have to find her, before she’s lost forever!
